text: @realDonaldTrump JUST BECAUSE YOU TWEET IN ALL CAPS DOESN’T MEAN IT’S TRUE. The only tragedy befalling our nation, besides Coronavirus (on which you failed miserably), is that you’re still squatting in the White House. When you’re not golfing.
